    • fillDefaults

      public void fillDefaults​(ConfReader confReader)
      Fill game rules left to null by this object's creator with defaults from a conf reader. Falls back to hard-coded values if the config parameter is not found
      Parameters:
      confReader - the configuration reader associated with game rules.
